alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; Roseau; West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 7:03PM CST until January 22 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation including light freezing rain. Ice accumulations of a glaze of ice. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions on untreated surfaces, including sidewalks, bridges, and some area roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Kittson; Roseau; West Marshall
